I recently purchased this toothbrush, and I'm impressed with its design and functionality. The fact that it comes with a cap is a game-changer for me ‚Äì it keeps the bristles clean and makes it easy to carry in my bag without worrying about hygiene. The toothbrush itself has a comfortable grip, and the bristles are gentle yet effective in cleaning. If you're looking for a reliable toothbrush that also considers convenience, this is a solid choice!
